name: SQLServerDeploy
description: Publish a dacpac file in especific database connection string
author: Gustavo Américo

inputs.name: dacpacPattern
inputs.label: File name pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name or pattern for search an dacpac file

inputs.name: dacpacPath
inputs.label: Path or path root
inputs.helpMarkDown: The dacpac file path or root.

inputs.name: connectionString
inputs.label: SQL ConnectionString
inputs.helpMarkDown: Server=tcp:{[database_domain_name or IP], [port]};Initial Catalog={databaseName};Persist Security Info=False;User ID={your_username};Password={your_password};MultipleActiveResultSets=True;Encrypt=True;

inputs.name: dbName
inputs.label: Database name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The database name for publish package

inputs.name: blockOnPossibleDataLoss
inputs.label: Block On possible data loss
inputs.helpMarkDown: specifies whether deployment should stop if the operation could cause data loss.

inputs.name: verifyDeployment
inputs.label: Verify deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown: specifies whether the plan verification phase is executed or not.

inputs.name: compareUsingTargetCollation
inputs.label: Compare using target collation
inputs.helpMarkDown: specifies whether the source collation will be used for identifier comparison.

inputs.name: allowIncompatiblePlatform
inputs.label: Allow incompatible platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: specifies whether deployment will block due to platform compatibility.

inputs.name: createNewDatabase
inputs.label: Drop and create database
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether the existing database will be dropped and a new database created before proceeding with the actual deployment actions. Acquires single-user mode before dropping the existing database.(Not Recomend for production)
